website_summaries.verdict: Available in a variety of colorful prints, these two-piece tankinis are cute and functional.
pros: Available in 42 different prints in sizes 2T to 14, so all the girls in your family are sure to find a favorite
Dries quickly and comfortable to wear
Made of quality nylon and spandex blend and fully lined
cons: Runs small, and some of the bottoms are cut a little unevenly

customer_reviews.title: The bottoms are oddly misshaped.
customer_reviews.text: The crotch of the swim bottoms are so skinny. There is minimal coverage there and across the buttocks. It is like a thong! Photos compare to another swim suit the same size. ( this is a size 10!)
customer_reviews.author: BeachReader25

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Order 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: I have a very petite granddaughter who is tall and thin. I am so happy I read the reviews for this, and ordered a 4T. It fits perfect. I suggest ordering 1 size up for length. Since my granddaughter is slim and rated at 10% of normal, I'm not sure how the width will fit for others. It is a little large around for her so if your child is 50 or 60% of normal it would still be good. Anyway, the product is well made and lovely fabric. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The suit looks cute and the top fits fine but the bottoms are not cut correctly
customer_reviews.text: The suit looks cute and the top fits fine but the bottoms are not cut correctly. The crotch is very narrowly cut with only 1 1/4" of fabric. My daughter is slim but regardless there is not enough fabric to cover the private area if seated cross legged at the beach. Privates would be exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Would have returned it if I didn't need a suit desperately.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the fit was a bit small. While my daughter is tall, the gap between the top and bottom was about 8 in, the top barely came to her bottom ribs. Based on the photo I was expecting a gap of an inch or two. The major problem I have with this suit is that the crotch fabric is only about 1 in wide in the photo the crotch looks about the same width as the hip bands but in reality its about half the width. Not ok for my 8yr old. I would have returned it if we didn't need a suit immediately.
customer_reviews.author: HiAltMama

customer_reviews.title: True to size for us.
customer_reviews.text: Very vibrant colors, nicer than the picture! My very picky kid gave it two thumbs up for comfort after we've already rejected so many this summer. No complaints about itchiness, straps, rise, etc.I did not read the reviews that said to order a size up and I'm glad I didn't. My 9 year old wears an 8 in most things and the 8 fit her perfectly here...maybe because it's a tankini and so the length is forgiving. She is not tiny by any means but generally too small for a 10 in other clothes. Love it! And great price too.
customer_reviews.author: EinVA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this suit. Super thick quality swimwear fabric. I'm a sewer, and the stitching is great. My daughter is 2.5 years old (pretty petit girl) and we ordered the 3T, fits her perfect. She is potty trained so it's perfect for her to pull the bottoms up and down to go to the bathroom. The colors are vibrant. The cris cross back is adorable. She loves it and won't take it off lol will defiantly buy this brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty but too small. My daughter age 10 just moved into size 12 clothes and I ordered a 12. It is way too small. Tank top rides higher and bottoms sit so low, leaves a lot of skin between the two. She is used to rankings that nearly meet in the middle and leave only 1-2 inches of skin showing. Very disappointing because it is beautiful. Would return for a 14, which I know would fit, but would probably still leave too much skin and may ride up in her hips. So back it goes. We also got her a size 12 Keanu one-piece and it fits perfectly. So will order another one of those.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppette

customer_reviews.title: Crappy, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the worst bathing suit I've ever bought. It fit fine but the color faded almost immediately. After 2 weeks it's not even blue anymore but some strange tan color. Major disappointment and major waste of money. My little girl wanted this suit for the blue color and now it's not even blue anymore. I understand some amount of fading but to lose all its color entirely is nuts.
customer_reviews.author: jmama

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but iffy sizing.
customer_reviews.text: This bathingsuit is beautiful! We got the Coral tropical one and my daughter loves it, I love it. BUT the top is much smaller than the bottoms. She’s 4, 42in and slim. I realize there is supposed to be a cute belly gap, but that aside, the top is very snug and the bottoms are loose. I was warned about this in other reviews, but took a chance since it’s so cute! She dives into the pool and plays hard, and the bottoms stay on, they’re just a little saggy. Overall it’s doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Better than Speedo
customer_reviews.text: What a great swim suit at a great price! I have never tried the Kanu Surf brand. My daughter loved the bright colors and design. The price was right so I thought, Why not?? What a great swim suit. My daughter has worn it every day since arriving. It fit true to size. The colors were bright and just as shown. The suit has not faded at all with wear and chemicals. It is stylish but still modest and able to be worn for athletic swimming. I have always bought speedo in the past but this suit has won me over
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Runs small as other reviewers mentioned. Daughter wears 2t -3t in all clothes and underwear. Sized up to a 4t and it fits similar to her 2t bathing suits botyoms seem smaller fit than top. Cute print,. My daughter is tall so it leaves 2-3”” of her mid drift exposed ( was hoping for no tummy showing ) but still cute. The trim color is not red though as picture looks, but more of an almost red/dark pink with a combo of darker and lighter pink, red and teal flower pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect little swim suits...
customer_reviews.text: bought two different styles of this swim suit...already had one of a smaller size and was pleased so purchased in larger size...suit looks darling on elementary age girls...straps are crossed and stay up on shoulders...swim suits always seem sized small, so i always order one size larger than needed...works on swim suits every time...love this style and will order again in larger size...granddaughter loves them...comfortable
customer_reviews.author: shasta

customer_reviews.title: Runs several sizes small!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually leave a review for items that just don’t work out for us, but considering how far off this sizing is, I feel compelled to warn you all so you don’t make the same mistake I did! I ordered a size 14, my 12-year-old daughter’s normal size, and it fits probably three sizes too small! The top of this suit could fit my 7 year old. The material seems nice enough, but if you’re going to order from this seller be sure to go up several sizes!
customer_reviews.author: writenow

customer_reviews.title: Good Find
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty true to size my daughter is between a size 7 and 8 I ordered the 7 waS too small so I ordered the 8. It’s not because it’s sized wrong I was just unsure. The 8 fits perfectly. She is pretty athletic and slender but needed to 8. She likes that it covers her mid section. Good thickness and it is lined nicely. Since we are in New York with the pandemic we are not going to the stores this was a good find.
customer_reviews.author: lmdmusicmaker

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. The colors are vibrant and the size five ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. The colors are vibrant and the size five fits my tall four and a half year old perfectly. This is the third Kanu Surf swimsuit I have purchased for her.
customer_reviews.author: B Blocker

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my girl a 2 piece because when she's wearing floaties, it's easier to go potty than when wearing a 1 piece. Its modest, but cute! It's a bit confusing for my 4 year old to put the top on by herself because of the criss cross back. We got a size 6, but next time, I'll go 6x because she is pretty solid and has a bigger butt. Overall, its great!
customer_reviews.author: Meral

customer_reviews.title: Bummed.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little small. I sized up as some said it was on the smaller side. My daughter is usually smaller than a 5/6. So I got the 5/6 and the bottoms fit but the top was way too small. The pink came out in the cold wash from the bottoms and are now faded. So the top and bottom are different shades of pink. Probably good for backyard play but won’t take it out in public now.
customer_reviews.author: H. B.

customer_reviews.title: Size Up
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I sized up to 5T for my daughter who fits a 4T. The design and style is really cute but I find it a little annoying to have to keep tying up the side bows on the bottom because she doesn't like it when the strings are hanging down. That's the only downside.
customer_reviews.author: MNicole

customer_reviews.title: our red suit is orange
customer_reviews.text: This suit looks more dark orange in person (at least the one we received did) the trim on the straps and the ties on the legs are definitely red, but then the suit itself is an orange/white- you can definitely tell the color difference b/w trim & suit.
customer_reviews.author: goSox

customer_reviews.title: WAY too small. It doesn't even cover my kid's diaper.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears 24month clothes so I got a 24month suit. It was impossible to get on, it was so small. So I sent it back and got a 2T. Too small, sent it back. Got a 3T, too small, sent it back. Got a 4T AND THIS GARBAGE WAS TOO SMALL AGAIN. How is this possible?! This is very irresponsible sizing. I'm extremely dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Horton

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, beautiful color, looks exactly like the picture. But runs very small! I bought a 4T for my almost 5yr old. She is tiny for her age and most 4T clothes fit her well. She finally just outgrew her 3T suit. But I love this suit and it fit my 2yr old perfectly so I’ll keep it. I would recommend buying up a size or two.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much we got 2 more
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this swim suit so much that we have multiple suits, all the same! I loved the X back of the top so the straps didn’t fall down while she was swimming and I LOVE the tankini style so it’s easier to go to the bathroom with a wet swim suit or while she has her suit on over her clothes. We had one 3T and two 4T’s. It fit as I expected it to. My daughter is a peanut so when she grew out of the 3T top we’d still use the 3T bottoms with a 4T top until she filled out down there.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: ... little nervous buying a girls suit online but I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous buying a girls suit online but I'm glad I did. I bought the Blue Chevron Stripe Alexa, it is a nice suit and looks cute on my girl. She's 6 and not tiny (80% height and weight) and I bought the 7 and it's perfect. The bottoms stay on and the top covers what it's supposed to cover through hours of fun pool play (swimming, jumping, wrestling and climbing on and off floaties and rings and noodles, getting tossed high by Daddy...). Great buy in my opinion. I'll be back to shop Kanu next time we need a suit!
customer_reviews.author: JPS

customer_reviews.title: High quality fabric and stitching
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the vibrant colors. I love the thickness of the material and that it’s sewn well. She is 8 and wears a size 8 in outer clothes, and a size 10 in panties and swimsuits. She’s been wearing this all summer and it’s been fantastic. Great coverage and cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my daughter perfectly...may run small for others
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is really small for her age (24 lbs, 3 yrs old). For swim wear she is wearing 18-24 months...but I took a chance and bought 2T in this swimsuit and fits PERFECTLY!!! (for regular clothes she wears a 2T) I am really happy with this...so cute! The bottom is the best part as it does not bunch up. Usually the bottom bunches to leave room for those who are still wearing swim diapers. The "bikini" bottom is a perfect fit. So if your child is average or normally wears a size larger than her age, I would order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fit Right
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size 8 for my tall, skinny 7 year old based on other reviews. It was still too small. The top was too tight and definitely too short if modesty is your goal. it JUST barely covers the belly if she stays perfectly still but exposes everything if she lifts her arms even a little. the bottom was weird. it just wasn't cut right. it was too small and didn't cover the whole hiney, but it was saggy in the crotch. And the crotch is only and inch and a half wide so it didn't cover much there even had it been flush to the skin. (her other bathing suits are 2.5" in the crotch.)
customer_reviews.author: SRQ girl

customer_reviews.title: Cute prints but runs SUPER small
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is 18mo (23lbs/33") and wears 24mo/2T...we read the reviews and ordered a 3T accordingly. Still too small. She would be wearing a 4T(?!) next Summer when she'll only be 2 1/2. Nice quality so we may consider re-ordering up to 4T. Not convinced we love the style and overall fit though for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit - tie-dye style is cool
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes this very much. The tie-dye is holding up well. It doesn’t scoop low. It is an above belly button tankini but my daughter is very tall. I wish it was a little longer. The bottoms are styled with more coverage than some other tankinis but are definitely bikini bottoms nonetheless. Since the top is on the shorter side, I like the bottom coverage. Overall it runs a little small for my daughter, so if between sizes, order up. She is very slender and tall for her age of 8. Recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ajbro123

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice, my daughter loves it. Little on the small side though. Sizing is so tough anyway, she’s five and I ordered a 7. Every place is different with sizing. She usually wears a 7 Walmart clothing and a 6 if it comes from like JC Penny or something. There’s really no consistency between brands. Hope this is helpful for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Straps frustrate my 4yo
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, decent quality for the price. It's for my 4yo who wears size 5T. Very average body type. Knocking off one star because of the straps. They are cute, I've worn styles like that myself, but my daughter gets so frustrated when putting the top on. She always puts her arms in the wrong loops. For an independent girl who's been dressing herself before she turned 3, this is an issue for us. But, other than this minor thing, it's a 5 star kids bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small!
customer_reviews.text: We bought four of these tankinis last year and have bought two this year. They definitely do RUN ONE SIZE SMALL so order accordingly. I like them because they are modest without being a one piece so they still feel trendy for tweens. The quality is good and we have not had an issue with fading.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in SD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, order 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: Love these swimsuits! I purchased one size up for both of my daughters as suggested by other reviews, and they fit perfectly. The colors are very vibrant and the suits still look brand new after several trips to the pool and the splash pad this summer. The fabric hasn't even gotten little pills on it after contact with concrete! Very satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hock

customer_reviews.title: Good Suit
customer_reviews.text: I was worried by the reviews saying the crotch on the bottoms was weird. But the suit we got was great, no issues, fit perfectly and looks cute. My daughter has been using it 3 times a week or more for months. We always rinse the chlorine and hang it to dry, no dryer. It's still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Ray

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty but runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty but runs very small. My daughter wears a 12. Ordered a 12 which fit like a 6 or 8. Returned. Quality seemed nice, but order a couple sizes larger.
customer_reviews.author: evenflow

customer_reviews.title: Bought a size up
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the two piece design. She had trouble managing a one piece after it was wet so this helps that issue. It was small. I bought a size up and the top barely meets the bottom. She is normally a 7 and I bought an 8. I was hoping this would last throughout the winter and through summer but I don't think it will. Otherwise it is holding up well and is comfortable for her to wear.
customer_reviews.author: W. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it! Thank
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter loves this suit! She is tall for her age and slender. She wears a size 12. The colors are more vibrant in person, especially the pink. We have bought several swimsuits from this brand, ( I have bought 5 of my children this brand this year, girls and boys) and have been pleased overall. Would buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too Small
customer_reviews.text: I gave it one star because the sizing is so off. I ordered a 2T for my daughter, who fits into a 2T a little loosely, and it was very tight on her. I would say this fits accurately as a 12 MO size. Regardless how cute it is, if it doesn't fit, this purchase was a waste of my time. Maybe this review can save your time but for me, 1 star is my experience. I would suggest to order 2 sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Just Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice bathing suits
customer_reviews.text: Nice material .. bold colors... I would def size up... my girls are recently 5 and they are wearing the 6x..Which just fits. My little one just turned two and she is wearing the 2t..And the bottoms are smaller and tighter than I would like considering that she needs to wear a diaper underneath...
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, buy next size up
customer_reviews.text: Got a 3T for my 2 year old daughter who typically wears a 3T in other swimsuits and clothes. Both the top and bottom ran small. Bottoms don't cover her diaper and are very snug. Top fits but is skin tight. Great price but I wish I bought a 4T instead.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old granddaughter needed a suit when she came to visit last winter. (For the pool at the hotel we were staying in.) It arrived quickly and, now months later in the summer, is on her body a lot. The quality exceeds expectation!
customer_reviews.author: JAK in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! And continues to impress!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand and style swimsuit for my daughter for the past three years! We are five swimsuits in and every single one has been perfect! Has lasted long! And fit just right! Hey survived I wanted to swim lessons a week and heavily chlorinated pools. After about 6 to 7 months of this abuse there was noticed fading, but I attribute it 100% to the repeated high chlorine exposure. Will continue to buy this brand for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Wash suit before allowing my 3t baby to wear.. The darn thing shrunk up. It shrunk down to a size maybe a newborn may wear😣, very disappointing. I didn't return, because it is not in original shape, tho, she never wore it.
customer_reviews.author: D. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is lined all over - front & back, top & bottom. The tank and the bottom are both fully lined. So it is not see-through when wet, yet the fabric & lining are breathable. My tween feels confident that her growing breast are "hidden" in this swimsuit. Super cute style too!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Cutest bathing suit!! Got a size 3T for my three year old, and was a bit nervous because she's tall for her age. However, it fit her perfectly! Vibrant colors and good quality. Have thrown it in the washer and dryer twice already and it looks exactly the same! No wear or tear!
customer_reviews.author: Karleen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This tankini is perfect for my 4 year old who always has to pee the second she gets her bathing suit on, lol. Love the color of the bathing suit, it's a very vibrant teal.it also gives my daughter more coverage than a typical 👙.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: I got size 6 for her and it fits great. The top is not too tight but I ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 years old, about 42 pounds and 43inches tall. I got size 6 for her and it fits great. The top is not too tight but I like it that way, it's easier to take it off when wet. It covers her belly and almost touches the bottom. I had to tie the strings on the sides of the bottom really good, because they keep coming undone. Very nice product, good price, fast delivery. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kinga

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered many Kanu surf swimsuits for my girls over the years. This is the first time I’ve been disappointed. We got 2 tankinis in the same size. One is about a size bigger than the other. The biggest issue is the fading. They have both faded drastically in just over a month. I f DD not leave them out in the sun and I don’t wash them that much. I’ve never had the issue with our other Kanu suits.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these suits (this one and the red polka dotted one) with the idea that I could return them for free if they were cheaply made or just too big/revealing/poor fit. Needless to say - we are keeping BOTH of the suits. They are so cute and even cuter on our daughter. She is 3.5 years old and weighs 29-30 lbs. I bought size 4. The top fits a little loose but the bottoms fit perfect. We had my daughter run around her room to make sure the bottoms didn't slip off with activity. We haven't tried them at the beach or in a pool yet but I think it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Weber

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are really sturdy suits, great for the 4-8 set: they have great coverage, and kids can really swim in them. These have lasted us for now going on two summers, which has been a pleasant surprise. Tons of fun colors and patterns, and they hold up beautifully to a summer of chlorine and running gleefully through sprinklers and around a playground.
customer_reviews.author: WaHi

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Agreed with other reviewers - we ordered the Olivia Blue Chevron in size 10 and the bottoms were TOO NARROW for my daughter. I read the reviews before purchasing, but decided to try it anyway since we have another Kanu suit that fits well. Bummer ... a whole inch narrower than the tankini bottoms we have. ??
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Great colors very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and colors we exactly as pictured. My daughter wears a size 8 in clothes and bathing suits tend to run small for my thick & tall 5yr old, so I bought a 10 but still slightly small for my liking but exchanged for a 12 and it fits great and looks cute!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Fabric wear after one use
customer_reviews.text: After one wear and wash (per the instructions) there is already piling on the bottoms. They also run small. My daughter is a 4T and the size 5 is snug. The only positives are the cute designs and it didn’t shrink when washed.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Hillmann

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10 year old daughter. She loves the colors. Has good coverage of her stomach while still easy on and off in a 2 piece
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but sized smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this has a birthday gift for my bestfriend's daughter. She is a very petite 8-year-old, so I ordered a size 8 thinking it would be perfect. The delivery was prompt, so when I received it and saw that it looked a little too small, I was able to order the next size up (10) and still get it in time for her special day! Overall, good quality and she is happy and ready to wear it this summer!
customer_reviews.author: MOMofCCO

customer_reviews.title: Insanely small even 4 sizes up!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo small! My daughter is 9 and wears a size 10 but I figured I'd order a size up just in case, so i ordered a size 12... and it was SMALLER than a TEN should even be. I exchanged it for a FOURTEEN and it STILL does not fit. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Koosamonkey

customer_reviews.title: Love Kanu tank suits.
customer_reviews.text: we can never go wrong with Kanu surf suits. This tank style comes in a variety of prints and stripes. We've had about 5 of them through the years. They run true to size and my daughter never complains about being uncomfortable. They wash up well (machine wash cold, line dry) and don't pill or fade. We purchased the size 5 in the navy/turq stripe for my 4 1/2 year old. She's about 41" tall and typically wears a 4/5 in bottoms and a 5/6 in tops. This fit perfectly and will likely fit her into the summer (it's winter now).
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Winner!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter’s new favorite. The shirt hits at about the belly button so no worries about coming up too high when she jumps or dives in. The cut is cute and she says it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Not quality
customer_reviews.text: NOT quality. I bought this suit for my 10 yr old daughter and it lasted 2 weeks. Straps tore from top and seams popped their threads after 1st use. It fit fine and it's pretty but NOT a quality suit.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking suit, unfortunately runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit in the largest size, hoping to use it next summer. My granddaughter is starting to wear a size 10 now. The suit I ordered fits her just as a size 10 does. I would say that this suit runs two sizes smaller than it should. BUT I kept the suit since it's very well made and she'll have an extra one to wear while I wash the wet one.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Niece loved the swim suit
customer_reviews.text: Niece loved the swim suit. It does run a bit small. She wears a 7/8, I ordered the 8 and it fit but no room to grow. I also ordered a 10 and it fit great in the top, but was too big in the bottoms. She has an athletic build. The bottoms cover well, the top doesn't come all the way to the bottoms. There was a several inch gap on her, but this would vary in the height of the child. The suit is very pretty, brighter green than the picture shows, but I like it more in person than in the pic. Seems to be well made, and should last her until she outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: RLH

customer_reviews.title: Great budget buy
customer_reviews.text: I got these on sale for like $5 or $6 so I'm beyond thrilled. I do see what people are talking about with the small bottoms but we have so many of those that I'm not terribly worried. Plus my kids like to wear shorts too. But for the price these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute bathing suit! And at a great price too. My daughter is 3.5 years old, 29-30 lbs. I bought a size 4. The top is a little loose but ok by our standards since she has room to grow. The bottoms fit well - we had her run around her room to make sure they don't fall off with activity. I would definitely buy this brand of bathing suits again!
customer_reviews.author: Weber

customer_reviews.title: Adorable suit
customer_reviews.text: The suit was a perfect fit and one little girl was really excited when she saw it. Since swimsuits usually run small, I ordered one size up and it fit her to a t. The colors are true to picture.
customer_reviews.author: wendyb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Runs one to two sizes too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought two separate swim suits for my granddaughters. One is taller than the other, both slender/average size. I checked the size chart and reviews and ordered accordingly. Both were noticeably too small. I would order up at least one if not two sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great fit on slender body
customer_reviews.text: Size 5 fits a very slender 5 YO, 36 lbs, 42". She has no bottom to speak of, and these stay up even when she is very active. It is true that the bottom fits on the low side and the top leaves a gap, but unfortunately that is the style right now for little girl tankinis. I am just thrilled to have bottoms that stay up and a top that is fairly easy to get on & off. She wears a swim shirt when in full sun, so that eliminates the "skimpy" problem. The color and style are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Odd fitting bottoms for 2yr old frame
customer_reviews.text: Bit of an odd fit, bottoms tight & small for 2 year old. In my opinion a 2 year old should not wear teeny tiny bikini bottoms. Let’s say, The fit would be good for a 20yr old on vacation in Cancun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright Vivid Colors
customer_reviews.text: Cute suit, LOVE the vivid colors. Decent thickness of material. Not too thin to where you can see through, but would have liked it to be a little thicker. She was frequently complimented on this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but runs small
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is very adorable but unfortunately it does run small. My daughters size 5 bathing suit was getting too small so I ordered this in a size 6. It is just as tight as her previous bathing suit if not tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Kdouglas91

customer_reviews.title: Cute, good quality, order a size or two up!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and good quality! My daughter is 26 pounds, 25 months and I ordered her a 3T. It fits properly now. She will probably grow out of it by the end of summer. So order a size or two up. The bottoms have plenty of room they’re just very low cut and when she bends over I don’t want her bum to show.
customer_reviews.author: Copper

customer_reviews.title: If its China sizing, then say so in the ad.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 suits all size 12. The suits that came are probably size 8. Its too bad because these are super cute. My daughter was excited. 2 weeks wait and she has $60 in unusable swimsuits. Guess well go see if walmart has any left in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Cute but after a few hours of wear my average sized 4 yo said it was hurting her. Straps And leg openings were cutting in to her skin. Size up if you’re looking at this product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bloom

customer_reviews.title: the suit fits great and my daughter seems comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 and about 41inches and 42 lbs. The size 5 fits her perfectly. The sides on the bottoms were not too high cut (this was initially a concern. Overall, the suit fits great and my daughter seems comfortable. Very adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and made well
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for 2pc swimsuits for my 3 year old with modest coverage (2pc suits make toilet trips easier and the modest coverage requires less sunscreen). I would call this a tankini for sure. I suspected that this suit would bare a little skin between the top and bottom, which it does. While I would prefer the top be a little longer, this swimsuit was cuter in reality than the pictures show.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien Martin

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Really fits well and looks great on her. She said it is comfortable and I like that it dries quickly. She uses it every week for swimming lessons and it’s cute without being too revealing for a 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: shamrocksmom

customer_reviews.title: Great colors - very bright.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty swimsuit. Looks fantastic. My 8 year old is tall and weighs 84 pounds. I bought the size 12 & it fit perfectly. It was a returnable item but did not need to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Brian hall

customer_reviews.title: You wont let me return this and it's too small
customer_reviews.text: The product does not fit. I bought this in advance and only gave it to my daughter on easter. Tried it on her today the bottoms are to small. And it doesnt fit. She won't be able to wear it this summer. And now I go on here to return this and get the right size and its past its return date. I am surprised and super disappointed. Love the suit and its pattern and color but it doesnt fit and not able to return it is just wrong. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made suit!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is wonderful! Thicker fabric, stitched together well, smooth & very comfortable for my 4 year old. The colors are stunning & my daughter giggled with glee & said she felt "like a mermaid" when she put it on. I purchased this for swim classes one per week over the winter & hope my little girl doesnt grow out of it too soon or I will have to buy another! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Mom

customer_reviews.title: real cute
customer_reviews.text: 2 piece fits well. She is 11 and wears a 10 in bottoms, 12 on top. The top if child is developing may be too small the bottoms fit her perfectly. I also bought 12 in the one piece and am returning because the length is too short. This is a common issue though with my child, she has a long torso
customer_reviews.author: shannwil

customer_reviews.title: These run at least a size smaller than listed; it was a very tight 14!
customer_reviews.text: My girls are thin as a rail, and these swimsuits were very tight; a '14' looks like a at least a 12 if not a 10 on my girls. Not happy with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Garcia Curiel

customer_reviews.title: teeny bikini bottom
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 8 for my six year old because we loved our Kanu one-piece last year but wanted easier potty breaks. The top seemed to fit well but the bottoms left over four inches showing under her belly button. Not a good look for a six year old girl. Trying to figure out whether to return or look for bottoms elsewhere... bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Kamin

customer_reviews.title: 36 lbs) and the little girls size 4 is a perfect fit for the pool and beach
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this bathing suit. She’s tall and skinny (41 inches tall, 36 lbs) and the little girls size 4 is a perfect fit for the pool and beach. The bottoms stay on and the top covers most of her belly. Very happy with this suit and will probably buy another one in a different print.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Podolak

customer_reviews.title: Runs small-order a size (or two) bigger!
customer_reviews.text: Cute suit in a stylish pattern. I ordered a size 3T for my average size two-and-a-half year old. The bottoms are SO small. They fit, but barely in a swim diaper as she is not potty trained yet. Just be aware the suit runs small. I wish I would have purchased it in a size bigger. I hope she makes it through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Tara S

customer_reviews.title: Buy up a size or more
customer_reviews.text: Got a 9-10 for my 9 year old, should have sized up more. She can wear it but her belly shows more than I like and she won’t wear this after this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a Bit Small
customer_reviews.text: The suit seems to be well made and the colors are nice and bright. The only real criticism is that they run small. I ordered one full size larger than what my 7 year-old daughter currently wears, anticipating that it would last through the summer. It just fits her now, I'm not sure it will still fit in August. You will definitely need to order at least one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Covers back side well
customer_reviews.text: Love Kanu swim suits for my girl. She has a bit of a "back porch" and the 2 piece bottoms still cover it perfectly. We had a smaller size and it lasted us 2 summers. Just bought the same style in a larger size and different pattern this year. SHE LOVES IT. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: rareynolds

customer_reviews.title: totaly waste of money - fades quickly to almost white.
customer_reviews.text: Super crapy dyes -- if you are going to use this for a handful of times and throw away, then it is fine. If you want to use it for a year of swim lessons -- you are just a fool to buy it. Ours after weekly use isn't even poka dotted anymore.. total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: McCann

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well made and fits nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Kanu Surf Melanie tankini for granddaughter. Nice quality fabric and well made. It fits nicely and the purple and lime colors are very tropical and her favorites.
customer_reviews.author: tdptuffy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: A 4t swim suit should have fit my daughter perfectly. The bottoms looks much smaller than they should have been. When I went to have her try it on, I discovered one of the seams was not sewn in properly (see picture). I'm disappointed because the style is adorable. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Hannibal Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Too short on top, didn't cover her belly
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit was cute but nothing special. I returned it because it didn't cover my daughters belly the way I would expect a tankini to do. On her, it was basically a bikini! Funny how hard it's been to find a suit that is 2 pieces so it's easy for potty training but still covers all those areas.
customer_reviews.author: xtopherous

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and design but it DOES run small. My 11yo girl is very slim and she usually wears size 10 especially for bathing suits. However i saw the reviews and ordered size 12. It fits her comfortably without baggy at all. Order one size up!
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Good bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter complained that this was itchy at first but after a few washes it’s perfectly fine! I love the print and it fits her really well!
customer_reviews.author: Vader’s Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size up because I wanted it to last, it fits her perfectly with a little growing room. The print is bright and colorful, she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: JerseymominNC

customer_reviews.title: Fits but Colors Faded
customer_reviews.text: This suit faded from clear vibrant red and stark white polka dots to muted dull red and off white dots after the first 30 minute swimming lesson. The suit fits well, other than the bottoms are a little big on my 5 year old, but she's tall and thin. The quality seems pretty good, but I'm disappointed in the color change so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute swimsuit.This is for my granddaughter. She's tall and lean, I'd say she's about 4"5, very slim. The bottom is just a little bit to big, but not big enough to notice. She will be 11 years old in a few days. The top fits her perfectly, the suit looks good on her. The colors are great. I think if I got a size 10, it might had been little to small. Hopefully she'll be able to use it also next season. Glad I bought it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Cute print, too small.
customer_reviews.text: The print is adorable! However, my daughter is still in diapers so we use swim diapers. The bottom of the swim suites didn’t fit over the diaper and was almost too tight to fit even with out the swim diaper on. The top fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hill

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this suit
customer_reviews.text: Lots of cute patterns to choose from! This arrived looking and fitting as expected. It’s made with good quality. Will order from here again.
customer_reviews.author: yeah

customer_reviews.title: Cute!  Bottoms not meant to cover diapers.
customer_reviews.text: This swim suit is so cute! It fits as expected, but the bottoms are cut as if they will be worn without a swim diaper under them. While at the beach, I used the bottoms over a regular disposable diaper (my child didn't get in the water), and it covered it was ok. The bottoms didn't work well over our cloth swim diaper, however, so we just skipped the bottoms. I would buy again just for the cute top.
customer_reviews.author: LRH

customer_reviews.title: Nice but on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 4T for my tiny 3yo who still fits in some 2T clothes and usually wears a 3T thinking she could wear it even if a bit large, and it would have lasted through summer. It fits perfectly now though. Aside from that, it looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Decent item
customer_reviews.text: Cute suit. Fits just right for the summer, but no room for any growing. Daughter wears a size 10-12, suit was a 10.
customer_reviews.author: MagS

customer_reviews.title: Cute swimsuit but it runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Cute swimsuit, good fabric but unfortunately runs really small. I would recommend ordering 2 sizes up to be in the safe side. I ordered one size up is it was a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rafaelaw

product_meta.title: Kanu Surf Girls' Melanie Beach Sport 2-pc Banded Tankini Swimsuit
product_meta.description: Kanu Surf presents our newest swimwear styles yet. Kanu, a surf and swim lifestyle brand, is well known for great prints and colors along with high quality functional apparel for the whole family. All of our girls swimsuits are made with a high quality nylon/spandex tricot fabric and are lined both front and back. All of our prints are available in multiple bodies many times with 1-pc or 2-pc options. Kanu bathing suits are great for the active athlete as well as for the recreational swimmer. Our Melanie 1-pc swimsuit sports a cool geo print. Available in all girls sizes 2 thru 16 so sisters can hit the beach scene as a team. Check out our many coordinating board shorts and rash guards to make a great set
feature_bullets: High quality UPF 50 plus nylon tricot
Matching rash guard and board short available
